title: ➽Gorgeous Somerville 4 Bedroom Available 9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'Rent: $4,300 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet-Friendly', 'Parking:: off-street parking (1 Spot)', 'Gorgeous Somerville 4 Bedroom Featuring Hardwood Floors, an Eat-In Kitchen, Updated Appliances, Fantastic Natural Light, High Ceilings, Good Closet Space, a Great Layout, a Dishwasher, and Onsite Laundry.', 'Right in the Beautiful Somerville near Assembly Square, Target, Encore, Bus Lines, and Many Fantastic Bars/Restaurants!', 'Pet Friendly!', 'Video Tour Available!', 'Off Street Parking Included (1 Spot)', 'Available September!', 'Contact me via email!', 'Crew Fitzpatrick', 'CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams', 'Rentals @ CFBRealestate .', 'com', 'Utilities: Water Included (Tenant Pays Gas Heat and Electricity)', "Move in Costs: First Month's Rent, Security Deposit, and Broker Fee (No Last Month's Rent Upfront)", 'Thanks for checking out my listing.', "I would love to work with you and find you a fantastic apartment, I offer Boston's largest personalized video database for ease of access!", 'To confirm availability for this unit and to see other great available listings please email me!', 'Green Line @ Union Square (0.50 mi)', 'Bus: 68 Broadway @', 'Ellery St (0.48 mi)', 'Bus: 69 Cambridge St @ Camelia Ave - Cambridge Hospital (0.30 mi)', 'Bus: 83 Beacon St @', 'Washington St (0.09 mi)', 'Bus: 91 Springfield St @ Newton St (0.29 mi)', 'Bus: 85 Summer St @ Vinal Ave (0.40 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Washington St @ Calvin St (0.02 mi)', 'Bus: 87 Somerville Ave opp School', 'St (0.27 mi)']
